contentrichtext.text: '''Tibor''' is a [[Hungary|Hungarian]] form of a masculine forename. It is usually believed to be a shortened form of the name ''Tiborc'' which name originates from the ancient Latin surname [[Tiburtius]].{{Citation needed|date=February 2012}} Some notable men known by this name include: *[[Tibor Benedek]] *[[Tibor Feheregyhazi]] *[[Tibor Kalman]] *[[Tibor Ordina]] *[[Tibor Renyi]] *[[Tibor R. Machan]] *[[Tibor Stark]] *[[Tibor Szasz]] *[[Tibor Varga (ice hockey)]] *[[Tibor Varga (violinist)]] The name Tibor is also found in Romania, Slovakia, the Czech Republic, and Slovenia. * ''Tibor'' is the Hungarian name for Tibru village, [[CricÄƒu]] Commune, Alba County, Romania * [[TIBOR]] is the short name for the Tokyo Interbank Offered Rate {{given name|nocat}}<!-- It does not help to add disambig or hndis tags where the page only contains people who share a given name --> [[Category:Hungarian masculine given names]]
